backend/main.mo: Defines types and maps for investment plans, AI insights, and leads, loads default data, and provides comparison utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a wallet-route feature with related files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing routing, components, hooks, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining dark-theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app in dark mode.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon containing a geometric dark-themed logo with red accents.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that imports global styles and renders the AppRouter.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Dialog handling Internet Identity login flow with success, loading, and error states and redirects on success.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard header showing branding and a sign‑out button that clears identity and navigation state.
frontend/src/components/insights/AIInsig: Section that fetches and displays AI insights with loading, error, and styled insight cards.
frontend/src/components/site/AnalyticsPr: Displays animated portfolio metrics and a sample performance chart with disclaimer messaging.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Renders a contact form with validation and lead submission plus optional lead list viewing.
Shows a collapsible FAQ list detailing platform functionality, security, and investment details.
frontend/src/components/site/FeaturesSec: Presents a grid of AI and security-related feature cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Provides the landing hero with background visuals, headline, CTAs, and stats.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingSect: Fetches and displays investment plans with loading, error states, and risk-based styling.
Renders the site footer with branding, social links, quick links, legal links, and a disclaimer, including smooth-scroll navigation.
Implements the site header with desktop/mobile navigation, smooth-scroll links, and buttons for dashboard navigation and sign-in.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIInsights.ts: Fetches AI insights from the backend actor using react-query when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and related state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Loads investment plans from the backend actor with react-query when the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Fetches lead entries from the backend actor when enabled and the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Provides a mutation for submitting lead data and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Handles querying and saving the caller’s user profile via the backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for accessibility and visuals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up react-query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing welcome text, stat cards, and quick actions, using user identity and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page composing marketing sections and routing callbacks for sign‑in and dashboard navigation.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Wallet page displaying balance, deposit/withdraw buttons, and empty transaction history with navigation controls.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Hash‑based router mapping routes to pages with protected routes and sign‑in dialog handling.
frontend/src/router/ProtectedDashboardRo: Wrapper that checks authentication state and either shows loading, prompts sign‑in, or renders protected content.
frontend/src/router/useHashRoute.ts: Custom hook implementing simple hash routing with route state and navigation helper.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking features, pending requests, and project metadata.
